Talents.Name: Wanderer
Talents.Description: ATK increased to 110% when attacking. If there are 3 or more enemies nearby, ATK increased to 115%, and take 15% less damage

Talents.Name: Unmoved
Talents.Description: More likely to be attacked while deployed. When any Kazimierz Operator is attacked, reflect 15% of <Operator Name>'s ATK as True Damage
